import React,{useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import {Link,useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from "axios"; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import UploadTimeline from '../Timeline/RightTimeline/UploadTimeline' import InviteTimeline from '../Timeline/RightTimeline/InviteTimeline' import FeatureTimeline from '../Timeline/RightTimeline/FeatureTimeline' import CategoryTimeline from '../Timeline/RightTimeline/CategoryTimeline' const NewTabLike=()=>{ const [post, setPost] = useState([]); const [name,setname] = useState('') const [checked, setChecked] = useState(''); const [count, setCount] = useState(0) const [like,setlike]=useState(0) // console.log(checked) const toggle=()=>{ setCount(count+1) setlike(like+1) } let datalike={ count, like } const a= window.location.pathname const ids = a.substring(a.lastIndexOf('/') + 1); console.log(ids) const id=ids let userdata={ id }; useEffect(()=>{ axios.post("http://localhost:4444/SinglePage",datalike).then(response =>{ setChecked(response.data.like) }) },[]) useEffect(() => { axios.post("http://localhost:4444/SinglePage",userdata).then(response => { console.log(id) console.log(response.data.image); setPost(response.data.image); setname(response.data.name) }); }); return(
Singal Post
